Section.Field:
<script>
		            var FW_auth = {
		                token: "#{auth.Token}",
		                userKey: "#{auth.UserKey}",
		                loginID: "#{auth.LoginID}",
		                timezone: "#{auth.Timezone}",
		                fullName: "#{auth.FullName}",
		                profileImageName: "#{auth.ProfileImageName}"
		            };
		            var FW_paths = {
		            	accounturl: '#{accounturl}',
		            	fullaccounturl: '#{fullaccounturl}',
		            	baseurl: '#{baseurl}',
		            	resourceurl: '#{resourceurl}' 
		            };
		            var FW_param = {
		            	viewName: "#{param.viewname}",
		            	objectType: "#{param.objecttype}",
		            	en_objectID: "#{param.en_objectid}",
		            	objectID: "#{param.objectid}",
		            	zoomIn: "#{param.zoomin}"
		            }
		        	
		        </script>
